Perform a request and retrieve response

Source: R/sipri_request.R
sipri_perform_request.Rd

Executes an HTTP request and retrieves the response.

Usage

sipri_perform_request(req)

Arguments

req

An httr2 request object created by sipri_build_request.

Value

An httr2 response object containing the server's response.
